name: Lost in the Dungeon
description: A card-based grinding dungeon crawler that only the bravest adventurers can survive! Will you go full warrior, sneaky thief or powerful mage?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 1.2+ GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 600 Series or AMD Radeon HD 7000 Series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
